Item ID21000

The twisted buckler is a ranged-class shield that is obtained as a possible reward from the Chambers of Xeric.

Equipping the buckler requires at least 75 Ranged and Defence. It offers the best Ranged Attack and Ranged Strength bonus for the shield slot in the game. It also has some of the best Magic defence in its slot, beaten only by the dragonfire ward and spectral spirit shield. Its melee defence bonuses are comparable to an adamant sq shield.

 Attack bonuses
-7-8-7-10+18
 Defence bonuses
+22+24+22+26+58
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+10+0%+0List

30 June 2021
(update | poll)

The twisted buckler's Ranged Strength bonus has been increased from +0 to +10.

[[File:Twisted buckler detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''twisted buckler''' is a ranged-class shield that is obtained as a possible reward from the [[Chambers of Xeric]].

Equipping the buckler requires at least 75 [[Ranged]] and [[Defence]]. It offers the best Ranged Attack and Ranged Strength bonus for the shield slot in the game. It also has some of the best [[Magic]] defence in its slot, beaten only by the [[dragonfire ward]] and [[spectral spirit shield]]. Its melee defence bonuses are comparable to an [[adamant sq shield]].
